mapper.select: select HOSPITAL_ID, NAME, TREAT_START, TREAT_END, ADDRESS, TEL, INFO from HOSPITAL
select a.pic_lib_id, upload_path, file_name from pic_lib a, pic_lib_rel_hospital b where a.pic_lib_id = b.pic_lib_id and hospital_id = #{hospitalId}
select count(*) from pic_lib_rel_hospital where hospital_id = #{hospitalId}
mapper.insert: INSERT into content(CONTENT_ID, BODY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE, CATEGORY_ID, USER_EMAIL) values (CONTENT_SEQ.nextval, #{body}, sysdate, sysdate, 4, #{userEmail})
insert into hospital_qna(hospital_qna_id, hospital_id, content_id) values (HOSPITAL_QNA_SEQ.nextval, #{hospitalId}, CONTENT_SEQ.currval)
mapper.select: select a.content_id, body, created_date, updated_date, user_email from content a, hospital_qna b where a.content_id = b.content_id and hospital_id = #{hospitalId}
